abstract_summ: RESULTS: Between January and May 2020, 1084 confirmed COVID-19 cases were reported, about 70% of which had travel history during the incubation period.The local epidemic progressed through four phases: (i) preparedness and imported infection from mainland China, (ii) local transmission, (iii) imported infection from overseas countries associated with local transmission, and (iv) controlled imported infection with limited local transmission, with an eventual reduction of daily case number and minimization of onset-to-admission interval.RESULTS: As of February 24, 2020, there have been 135 confirmed cases, 3 deaths, and 87 recoveries in Tianjin, China.Methods: All COVID-19 cases reported through February 11, 2020 were extracted from China's Infectious Disease Information System.We collected currently available information for 377 COVID-19 clusters (1 719 cases), excluded the hospital clusters and Hubei cases, during the period from January 1, 2020 to February 20, 2020.
title_summ: Epidemiological parameters of coronavirus disease 2019: a pooled analysis of publicly reported individual data of 1155 cases from seven countriesCluster analysis of epidemiological characteristic features of confirmed cases with the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outside China: a descriptive studyEpidemiologic Characteristics of COVID-19 in Guizhou, ChinaEpidemiological characteristics of the first 100 cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China, a city with a stringent containment policyThe epidemiological characteristics of 2019 novel coronavirus diseases (COVID-19) in Jingmen, Hubei, ChinaThe Epidemiology of COVID-19 cases and the Successful Containment Strategy in Hong Kong – January to May 2020Epidemiologic Features of 135 Patients With Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) in Tianjin, China[Study on transmission dynamic of 15 clusters of coronavirus disease 2019 cases in Ningbo].[The preliminary analysis on the characteristics of the cluster for the Corona Virus Disease].[The epidemiological characteristics of an outbreak of 2019 novel coronavirus diseases (COVID-19) in China].Epidemic characteristics of COVID-19 in four Chinese cities.
title_abstract_phrases: The Epidemiology of COVID-19 cases and the Successful Containment Strategy in Hong Kong – January to May 2020BACKGROUND: Hong Kong, a Special Administrative Region of China, recorded its first confirmed Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) case on 23 January 2020.RESULTS: Between January and May 2020, 1084 confirmed COVID-19 cases were reported, about 70% of which had travel history during the incubation period.The local epidemic progressed through four phases: (i) preparedness and imported infection from mainland China, (ii) local transmission, (iii) imported infection from overseas countries associated with local transmission, and (iv) controlled imported infection with limited local transmission, with an eventual reduction of daily case number and minimization of onset-to-admission interval.RESULTS: As of February 24, 2020, there have been 135 confirmed cases, 3 deaths, and 87 recoveries in Tianjin, China.Describe the epidemic characteristics of COVID-19 in Jingmen, Hubei, introduce the local prevention and control experience, and observe the impact of various prevention and control measures on the number of new cases.
